name: okvee/fuel-start
description: The backoffice system built on FuelPHP framework for developers.

suggest.dwoo/dwoo: Allow Dwoo templating with the Parser package
suggest.mustache/mustache: Allow Mustache templating with the Parser package
suggest.smarty/smarty: Allow Smarty templating with the Parser package
suggest.twig/twig: Allow Twig templating with the Parser package
suggest.pyrocms/lex: Allow Lex templating with the Parser package
suggest.mthaml/mthaml: Allow Haml templating with Twig supports with the Parser package
